title: David Bedford - Rime of the Ancient Mariner (1975) [APE]
description:
David Bedford - Rime of the Ancient Mariner (1975)

Genre: UK, Avantgarde, Progressive Rock, Psychedelic Rock, Symphonic Prog

Tracklist:

1. The Rime of the Ancient Mariner Part I (20:32)
2. The Rime of the Ancient Mariner Part II (20:38) 

Personel:
- David Bedford / Grand Piano, Lowrie Organ, Challenger Gem Organ, Chur Organ,
Piano Strings, Recorders, Chime Bars, Winebottlephone, Glorfindel Sound Machine,
Flute, Violin, Cymbals, Gong
- Mike Oldfield / Guitar
- Diana Coulson / Vocals
- Lucy Blackburn / Vocals
- Classes 2 and 3 from Queen's College / choir
- Robert Powell / Narrator
